Instafix GPS gives customers real-time pace and distance on their wrist.

Customers can send and receive messages, via e-mail, even when their phone is back at home. Messages are sent and received on the AT&T mobile broadband network via an e-mail address associated with the device.

Customers can bring up to 1000 of their songs with 4GB of storage and listen from their Bluetooth® headphones or speaker.

Customers can share their workout or race with friends in real time. Customers can even send an SOS with their location to their contact list, if they’re in trouble.
